messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

second floor booking issues second floor booking issues dear please let know how proceed with should use other for booking room grateful sent monday undeliverable pass failed these or groups second floor address you entered be found please check recipient address try message if problem continues please contact your diagnostic information for administrators generating server second remote server returned resolver found original message headers with server id mon with id mon content type application name content transfer encoding binary pass thread topic pass thread index calendar originator id ca date mon message id bb accept language en en content language en attach bb mime version transport hosted originating return path
